alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 6:08PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact Winslow and portions of Navajo Nation through 645 PM Arizona Time or 745 PM Navajo Nation Time... At 605 PM Arizona Time or 705 Navajo Nation Time, 40 mph winds were measured at the Winslow Airport due to strong thunderstorms. This strong thunderstorm near Winslow, is moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Automated Weather Observation Equipment. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winslow, Rimmy Jims, southern portions of Navajo Nation southeast of Leupp and Homolovi State Park Campground. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 252 and 257. Interstate 40 between mile markers 235 and 264. State Route 87 between mile markers 332 and 352. State Route 99 between mile markers 34 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Blowing dust will be possible along the I-40 corridor.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
